sub_title: Legal Advisor specializing in International Criminal Law and Procedure. Professional interests also include International Human Rights, International Humanitarian Law, and Public International Law.
summary: Accomplished Special Prosecutor with 16+ years of prosecution experience.   Most recently employed in the high-pressure role of special prosecutor – the rare government attorney position in the United States that routinely handles both high-level criminal trials, and complicated criminal appeals.   Career demonstrates mastery of complex factual and legal issues associated with substantive and procedural criminal law.   Developed international prosecution experience with the Office of the Prosecutor at the ICTR in Arusha, Tanzania, and with the Special Court for Sierra Leone.  Achieved exemplary educational qualifications including a JD with numerous accolades related to international law, which is currently being supplemented by a forthcoming Advanced LLM in Public International Law with a specialization in international criminal law from Universiteit Leiden.
